all_reviews.review_title: Textedly is THE BEST!  Highly recommend to anyone needing to mass communicate.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
Textedly is simple to set up.  Easy to explain how to use and sign up members.  It is convenient to set up future texts and schedule them to go out at specified times.  Customer service is most helpful and pleasant to work with.  The cost is affordable and fair.  The amount of messages is generous.  The cost of adding additional keywords is also acceptable.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
It is sometimes difficult to search through past messages.  We are small and send identical texts out often.  It would be nice to go back and resend the identical text.  I would really like to see an app for use on my cellphone.  It is a little difficult to send messages from my cellphone instead of a desktop comupter.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
If Textedly meets your needs, sign up now!  You won't find a better provider of this service.  Textedly offers a variety of plans and price points suitable for all situations.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can communicate with our congregation easily.  We share upcoming events and notifications, allow our guests to RSVP for events and services, and notify them of schedule changes and cancellations.  It's all done with the touch of a few buttons on a desktop.  The best benefit of Textedly can communicate via text in a group.  Each participant does not receive all of the responses.  All answers go back to the dashboard to be monitored by me, decreasing the amount of unsubscribes!

all_reviews.review_title: Great way to communicate with all of your employees/team members
Textedly is an amazing texting system for small businesses!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
I've tried a few different texting companys, but Textedly is the best. I like the ease of the dashboard and the CSV file uploader. With this service, you can send texts in a matter of minutes. I also love that you can use tags as categories.

The tags help me to organize my contacts so that I can send out messages directly to the specific group that I want to reach. We use Textedly for our clients, former clients, and new prospects, and it's helped us to effectively reach and automate our processes with each group.

The best part is their prices are competitive. I highly recommend you using Textedly.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I wish I could send images at times, but it's not necessary. I usually sent my clients to a landing page with pictures. I also wish I could send email campaigns with textedly. That would be awesome to have all my contacts in one data base where I could send text and emails through 1 platform.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
This service is excellent, and I suggest that you do a demo and get started right away. The customer service is helpful and will assist you with making the best choice for your business.  Be sure to check out all the features in your dashboard and send out preview text before sending out a mass text.

I also suggest that you invite your friends to try out Textedly. They will give you additional text for referring your friends. If you have any other questions, reach out to your customer service representative.

I also recommend that you try out different campaigns through the service. See what works.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Textedlyh I'm able to send mass communication to current clients, former clients, and new prospects. Textedly helps me to send reminders, updates and  marketing material at a click of a button. Text marketing is the future of communination. Emails have a 10-30% open rate, but text campaigns are above 90%. This is what make it the best form of marketing. I  also like it because it's more personalable and you can get feedback quickly.

all_reviews.review_title: A simple and productive way to communicate to our team in the home care industry
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
Before Textedly, we did not have a easy way of communicating to our employees in a short period of time.  It was a very manual process and not efficient.  Now, we can quickly reach out to our entire team of home health aides or specific groups very quickly.  We've never had a tool that communicated to our team so effortlessly before we chose Textedly.  We are able to save all of the text conversations between the company and the employees for review and quality control.  I highly recommend Textedly.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
We have not experienced any downsides of using Textedly.  Our office personnel love Textedly and it helps them do their jobs more efficiently.  Our employees prefer interacting via text message and Textedly makes it very simple.  I do not know what we would do without Textedly.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
Don't wait.  Try Textedly now.  You will not regret it.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
When we have open shifts available, we can send out a text to the entire team in a matter of seconds.  Earlier today, we had to send out a mass text due to a last minute opening at one of our clients.  In those situations, Textedly is extremely valueable due to the nature of the message and our home health business.   In the past, we would have to call, email and text our employees individually, costing us valuable time.  Textedly helps us provide better service to our clients.

It is as advertised! A great and easy way to connect with a very large group that is cost effective without lacking options. all_reviews.review_title: Made it super easy to communicate with all my employees!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
Effective way to reach employees instantly, easy to use, easy to manage, loved that you could see the stats and if the message was delivered or not. Loved that you could upload your contact list easily instead having to manually add each person. Very helpful if you have alot of contacts! Super easy to maintain and the tool to allow scheduling messages at a specific time is also very helpful. You can schedule sereval messages at once and have them all be sent at different times. This allows you plan ahead.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
The limit on the characters and having to send more than one message at a time, having to break up the message into serval messages. Should increase limit on characters allowed. I would also recommend that they maybe set up a notification system via email, if we arent always signed in into the website. It would be nice to have an email sent to us

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
My advice for users would be to create nd upload your contact list via excel spreadsheet, this will make it much easier for you to upload a large mass or contacts all at once. Instead of one by one manually. However make sure you create the excel spreadsheet in the specific format textdly requires to avoid any error messages.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
No problems at the moment. However, this tool was so beneficial during the pandemic, when we needed to conduct a temporary mass layoff due to covid regulations to shut down. When we had to reach out to all our employees when we were allowed to return, this tool saved me from calling each employee one by one. I was able to message all employees at once to notify them when they could return to work. This was a huge time saver for me! It allowed me to send all information via text to each employee easily. Managing and replying to responses from each employee was super easy and organized. I could not be happier with this software/ tool. I cannot express how thankful I am that this tool was available to make a difficult time for everyone a little bit easier.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
We're in the event business for a not-for-profit and looked for an easy way to notify our registered guests of opportunities, social media shares, and reminders of when to tune into events. The customer service for Textedly is top-notch. Within 10 minutes of creating an account, they called me directly to see if I had any questions - and I certainly did. I also liked how easy it was to customize messages - instant replies and targeted texts. I also enjoy the bulk add feature. Even away from a desktop computer, this was easy to manage and we had great involvement.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
We only need the texting for one event at a time, so we didn't need a huge plan and chose the plan with one keyword thinking we'd just change the keyword as we changed events. How to change the keyword wasn't super clear, but I called customer service and found I could change keyword, I would just lose all the data for the previous keyword, and I had to unsubscribe all the numbers individually. It was still doable, and for our small budget was worth it, but not as easy as Textedly's other features.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
If you need quick setup, with good customer service - get Textedly. And ask them any questions - they're great at walking you through and making changes to yoru account while you're on the phone. Excellent customer service can be hard to find these days but Textedly has your back!

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
With textedly, it's easy to remind our subscribers of tuning into virtual events in the evening when they're away from their work emails that they'd typically receive that notice from. So they're home, waiting on a virtual gala to start at 7 pm, and whatever distractions they've got going on - ping! Our text reminder helps them tune in on time.

The ease of sending a message to all of my employees is quick and easy. In a minute or so I can text everyone in my company exactly what I want. The interface on the dashboard is simple and effective. You can predefine templates to make introduction messages easy and quick as well. Adding users or deleting them from the group is also very simple. Overall, the ease of use if the biggest highlight for me with Textedly.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
Instead of dislikes I have more of a wishlist for things I would like to see.
I wish that you could have more keywords on the lower level plans. I don't have a high volume of usage, so the higher plans are not very beneficial for me. All in all though, this doesn't present a problem for me however.
I would like to see an app (Android and Apple) to use the service with. Sending messages from my phone browser is easy enough, but an app would be better.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
My biggest problem and why I useTextedly in the first place is that my team (around 85) is spread out over different sites. This is the easiest way to communicate with them all quickly and to know they receive it. I have seen the speed in which I can get a message into all of my employees hands and I don't know of any better way to do it.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Senior Education and Workforce Development Specialist

all_reviews.review_title: Textedly is by FAR the easiest option when choosing an app for group texting.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
Roster management and messaging from within Textedly is so easy. When someone opts out, they remain on the roster, but you can still view the names to verify that they are no longer receiving texts. Messaging can be scheduled, which is an advantageous option. We have utilized this system to notify employees of COVID-19 related closures and issues. Amazing!

What do you dislike about Textedly?
The ONLY drawback is having to be very aware of how many characters are in your particular message to make sure that you meet the SMS industry standard. You can send more than one message. Fact is nobody wants to receive a very long text, but this is the only issue we have had.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
At the beginning of the pandemic, our company needed to find a manner to reach employees quickly regarding schedule changes or any other COVID-19 related issues. At the beginning we were able to effectively communicate shift changes to stagger employee contact in an effort to keep our work family safe and healthy.

all_reviews.review_title: Great service and super user friendly for all departments
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
This platform is by far the most user friendly platform I've ever used. I thoroughly enjoy that the platform is not overly complex and anyone new to the platform will be able to understand it quickly. you can even request a demo for someone to walk you through the platform. it's fantastic. it is also generous to be offered a 7 day trial which helps the consumer. Excellent all around.  These guys responded right away regarding our inquiry. They were also for on top of their follow up communication via email and phone calls.  - they set the bar on communication and customer service VERY high!

What do you dislike about Textedly?
there is nothing to dislike about the product. the one recommendation I would have is to have more detailed analytics telling the customer which one of the prospects actually read, opened, or clicked the link versus lumping all the customers together. this will help marketing understand which one of their clients especially loves, or especially doesn't like the platform. the one area of improvement that could be discussed is having examples of what the mass SMS should look like. if you are new to the SMS automation process, it would be a bit difficult coming up with a template during the middle of the demo. it's easy to say or write "test" but it would look more official with a given template.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
we're using textedly to solve how to reach our total customer base. the benefits we have realized is how time efficient and high tech this platform is. this doesn't require tons of experience to use efficiently so anyone on the team can take on this responsibility quickly. In terms of problem solving, they are able to help you reach your mass of CRM databases in one simple process. You load your list, set up your messaging, and then boom, you're done.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
The customer service is fantastic, and the user interface flows. No need for an instruction manual here. Messages have custom fields and I'm able to schedule text message blasts. Recipients can respond and chat via textedly, or unsubscribe themselves. This is perfect for keeping in contact with and communicating with my prospects, clients, and customers.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I wish they would use webhooks for incoming messages. When I am in the messages screen, clicking on a message to view it does not visually mark it as read, and incoming messages do not populate unless I refresh the page.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
Communicating with all my prospects and customers with a few easy clicks. I have been able to save a lot of time using this platform as opposed to sending individual messages to everyone like before. Also separation between my personal phone number and business. It's nice to have that boundary.

all_reviews.review_title: Textedly is a fabulous service, easy to use and integrates easily with other systems.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
I like how quick and easy it is to regularly reach our customers. The option to include images for targeted audiences is helpful for our top-tier consumers but doesn't require us to spend extra on our lower-rated contacts. The MailChimp integration is very useful for automating new subscriptions directly to the Textedly database.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
It's frustrating that draft messages do not save unless they get scheduled for delivery. Also, I'm not too fond of personalization costing extra with a paid subscription, but once we start to get results, we will likely purchase that add-on.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
Set up an integration with your CMS or email platform, so you don't have to enter phone numbers manually. It's straightforward, and new subscribers get added automatically.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our email open rates are meager. Textedly helps us reach more customers, and we have fewer to unsubscribe.

The ability to schedule sends for future dates. This allows me to set up a number of reminder messages for weeks in advance and then forget about them.

The price for additional keywords is ridiculously expensive. I run a small business providing services to other small businesses. I should be able to set up any number of keywords at little or no expense.

If you're looking for a simple solution to maintaining text communications with your customer base and need to keep costs to a reasonable length, then Textedly is for you. I've been using Textedly for several years now and it provides all of my text communication needs.

What do you like best about Textedly?
I like that I can quickly bulk text, my team, with a personalized greeting. It has opened up communication significantly

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I'd like to be able to copy the list recipients to a new text for a follow ups.   Tags & keywords don't always work  as timelines may differ when having to reachout to team members.  Here's an example.

I have to text 100 team members letting them know their account will expire.  So I have to individulally add them to a text.
A week later I need to follow up so I have to again enter the same 100 phone numbers into a new follow up text.

Being able to clone the original text with the same recipients would be very helpful.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am getting a much bigger response from my recipients than I do with email.   Communication is much better.

all_reviews.review_title: Textedly has been great for keeping my clients updated on what's new!
Great service for easy communication with customers and getting more work.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
It's very easy to use and navigate. It keeps the customers organized and keeps the customers that have unsubscribed so that you don't accidentally re-add someone that has previously opted out. Makes texting much easier with customers versus having to do it on a cell phone and allows us to send out a mass text instead of individual. It allows us to keep our customers informed whether its through advertising new services, sending out special discounts, confirming their appointment, or to let them know we are on the way. It's a great way to communicate with customers for anything really.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
We pretty much love everything about Textedly. The one thing that I wish would be possible is if we could see if the person opened the text message so we could weed out the people that aren't interested in our services and just haven't unsubscribed. The other thing that could be improvded would be the size of the text messages allowed to send and the ease in determining which size to select. If you select the middle size but then realize you need more characters it only allows you to downgrade back to the smallest size instead of giving you the option to upgrade to the larger size or downgrade.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
If you are looking for a new way to market to your customers or if you are tired of having to always physically text customers this is definitely a great solution. It allows you to text your customers like you are sending an email and allows you to send hundreds out at one time.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
It allows us to market to our customers in a way we haven't been able to do before. It also allows us to communicate about jobs, confirm appointments, or even schedule appointments through another medium which makes things easier for our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple. Affordable. Easy to use for a small business.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
I love how easy it is to use. There is no learning curve because it is so simple. It takes me less than 5 minutes to shoot off a text to my text subscribers. Did I say EASY? Yes, super easy. And, it was very affordable, too. I am still very impressed with the annual subscription. It works exactly as I wanted it to work.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I honestly don't know what there is to dislike about Textedly. I found them by Googling because I had surveyed my customers in my Facebook group and asked if they preferred texts or emails. It was a 50/50 split. I was shocked. I am an email person! So I figured I would look into starting a text subscriber list, and that is what prompted me to Google. Then I was able to talk to someone at Textedly and they described how everything would work, and there was a bonus going on of free texts if I did the annual plan. So I did. Nothing negative really. It all was seamless once I understood the different keywords, etc.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
50% of my customers prefer text over email. This is huge. I never would have guessed that. Now I am able to reach those who prefer texts. I am able to get customers to text back to me with questions as well. I have to log in to my Textedly account to respond, but that is fine. (unless there is a way I don't know of?) But seriously, this was super easy to address, and affordable, too! I am a one-man (woman) company, and I like it when things are easy.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
Ease of use - very intuitive and it was easy to learn.
We were searching for a tool that we could implement quickly.  I explored a couple of options in the process and found Textedly to be the one I could get up and running quickly.
I also like the fact that we can add pictures to the text messages - that's very useful for our application.
We ended up purchasing the extra number to use additional features available.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
Nothing to dislike at this point.  Like any tool with lots of features, you learn more as you go.  It's fun continuing to learn the capabilities available.
For example, the last time we were in the middle of a contest, I learned that I can create the messages well in advance and schedule when they are sent.  This was very helpful while we were in the middle of capturing results and providing support - we have a small team, features like that make each of us more productive.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
I find that for me, it's important to look at alternatives.  I did in this case as well and landed on Textedly.  Others I looked at were either just more complicated, or less intuitive.
I've had the opportunity to reach out to Textedly support a couple of times and I've been very happy with the level of support provided.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
So far, our primary use has been with our group of agents during contests.  We use the tool to make them aware of prizes they can win, help motivate them to work toward winning the prize, etc.  We use the tool to send pictures of the prizes they can win, the timeframe to win prizes, etc.
The biggest benefit of our application is that we can communicate with our group more quickly than by email and while they are out creating sales to win the prizes.

all_reviews.review_title: Awesome Texting Platform for Marketing & Customer Alerts! Two thumbs up!
all_reviews.review_content:

Textedly is easy to use, affordable, and advanced! We are thrilled with Textedly. After using other platforms, we were able to appreciate this dashboard. We can use Textedly to immediately reach employees, customers, vendors, or any group at all.  Customer service replies immediately, the dashboard is user friendly and our customers are happy with the service.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
Would be great if it also served as a messaging app outside of marketing, as an app on your phone.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
Anyone looking to transition from an email campaign to text messages, this is the way to go!
You can get a local number, set auto responses and do so much more!

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
Textedly enables us to notify all of our customers when their meal packages arrive at our store. We find that our customers appreciate texts more than emails.  We also use the system for marketing reminders, showcasing new meals, and more.  We're so happy with Textedly! Highly recommend!

all_reviews.review_title: many useful features that allow me to stay connected with subscribers in various ways.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
I like that I can create custom messages and talk to subscribers individually as well as receive their individual messages. It's also beneficial to be able to send group blasts to all of the numbers at once. I was also able to download all of the numbers during my current resting period where I am not using the platform so that I can import them again when I'm ready to rejoin. The website also shows all of the features and information I need to know regarding payment, phone numbers, analytics, etc. to keep me in the loop of my account status and my subscribers.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I'm not sure if I just didn't discover this feature, but if I could get text notifications when people respond to the number as if I'm getting actual text messages, that would be useful for me to respond quicker to my subscribers. Also the user interface of my account on the website was a bit confusing to navigate in the beginning. I wasn't sure how to respond to messages or even see that individual people had replied because the subject heading next to certain phone numbers wasn't people's responses but rather the last group message blast I had sent out which was a bit confusing.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
Textedly helps me find my strongest fans and targets my marketing towards them. It also helps me stay connected with them and gives them a special experience. I've been able to send links through textedly for group video calls where we've all bonded on a more personal level, further strengthening the bond between my fans and I. Also they have been the first to view new music and videos from me.

all_reviews.review_title: The best way to stay in contact!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
Textedly has been great for our organization to remain in contact with the community we serve during covid. We are able to get information to over 1,000 individuals quickly and conveniently. It is super easy to upload a mass list of subscribers and to schedule messages ahead of time! We utilize tags to make texting specific groups organized, efficient, and painless.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
All of Textedly's features are simple and easy for anyone on the team to use. There are no functions we dislike. We would, however, find it helpful if unused monthly texts rolled over to the following month and if there was an option to downgrade the number of texts subscribed for. It would also be wonderful if we could delete keywords as they become obsolete for our own use.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Textedly, we were able to remain in contact with our clients even with the isolation a COVID world has caused. Not everyone utilizes or checks their emails regularly and this texting service has allowed us to find a resolution to this issue. We will continue to use this service even after we are able to work in person with clients as it is a simple and effective way to stay in touch and sent out important updates and reminders to a large number of people.

all_reviews.review_title: Perfect for distribution and warehouse environments
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
The best part about Textedly is how user-friendly it is. Super easy to add and remove new employees. It also has a great feature that allows you to categorize employees using what they call "Keywords"  which is convenient for when we need to communicate information to a specific shift or department.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
The only thing I don't like about Textedly is the process of resubscribing a previously unsubscribed phone number which requires you to have the person text our assigned number with our keyword. It isn't a difficult process, but it would be quicker to resubscribe them from the website.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
I would definitely recommend Textedly for companies who send out frequent communications to their teams. We use it to send out shift delays, closings, or to remind employees of upcoming company events. Definitely worth trying.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
Textedly has helped us solve the issue of getting important, concise information out to all of our employees in a timely manner. Without Textedly, we would have to hold large group meetings for brief, but important information, or text employees from our own personal devices in several large group texts. With Textedly, we can send our communications out all in one shot.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use and affordable group text solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
It's easy to set up a keyword and get started texting quickly.
I was able to send the name and phone number from WIX forms via Zapier to subscribe new users to Textedly.
Now my client can copy/paste the URL of his new blog post and send to his subscribers!

What do you dislike about Textedly?
Really nothing. At this time we cannot send a group text via Zapier but that is coming soon. Tech support has been great to work with too.
It would be great to see a WIX full integration but maybe in the future.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
Try the 14-day free trial and upgrade later

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can now add SMS Text subscribing to our clients who already use email subscribe to newsletters. It allows the visitor the option to subscribe via email or text SMS.
The Textedly plans allow small organizations with smaller budgets to get started and grow in time.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
I like how I can easily send text messages to clients. I like how I have the option to upload mass contacts that are saved into another system. It is very easy to add subscriber information into the system. There is a fillable blank for all needed information. Since using Textedly in the practice it has made life very easy! I can text clients very quickly to notify them of any changes. I can also send out a mass or group text if I need to notifiy a group of people at one time. I also love the fact that I have the option to use this service directly from my cellphone. There is no need to have a desktop or laptop which I love. Overall, I think Textedly is a very good texting service and it has been more helpful than hurtful for us. It has definitley made notifying clients much easier than having to call when I can simply send a quick text. I mean this is 2021, everyone texts right...

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I dislike the fact that once you delete a subscriber, they have to opt back in instead of being able to add them in myself.

I also dislike how sometimes the responses from clients aren't always received. I have all notifications on (email, desktop, etc.) however, I don't always receive the response from my clients. I will not put this 100% on Textedly because it could be the cell carrier's fault.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
Good services with nice pricing! It gets the job done.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can now notify patients quickly.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
It was super easy to use the tool, and it took like one hour of setup. The customer service was also highly excellent and responsive. It took perhaps just under 24 hours to get a response from them and although there was some things that needed approval on their end, any time that I called them or emailed them they resolved it within the next business day. I can't emphasize enough how powerful the customer service is, when we were first onboarded, our customer rep called us proactively and asked if we needed help on using the tool.L

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I think the most annoying thing was it needed their approval in order to downgrade functionality and to be able to do mass subscriber uploads.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a bunch of students with varying levels of engagement with activities and announcements and most things get lost in our student emails, so reaching them where they are is super useful. The most important thing to me is that the tools are super easy to use and that we can rapidly deploy them and Textedly does that. One big issue for us is whether or not that tool can be used in the future and because Textedly is so easy to use, we are confident it can continually be used all the time. When students are trying to attend events we see that frankly they want to come and they usually just don't know whether or not they are free and it seems like Textedly allows for rapid enough communication.

I have to right click and open up new tabs on every conversation because I don't want to lose my spot in who has messaged me back. When I have 300 responses back from a marketing text message, it takes me a few days to keep everything organized. Wished it was just more user friendly in that aspect

review_question_answers.answer: Being able to reach my customers, it is hard, because I have to contact each one. Emails might never get opened or are just sent to the spam folder, phone calling is hard because if they don't recognize your  number they think you are a spam caller. But texting is awesome, everybody looks at it and responds

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent & Easy Way To Communicate With Our Customers

The user interface and ease of sending out a text message to our customers is superior to any others we have tried. We use Textedly every day to update our Rank Makers on the most recent training video. Funny thing is, if we miss a text people worry! This has become an integral part of our business and making our customers feel "in the know" and appreciated.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
Wish it was easier to send text messages internationally.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
If you have a solid US-based following, Textedly is the best text message platform we've used. Highly recommended.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
Communications with custmers. The benefits we've really noticed are that we get more engagement and interaction with our training videos and LIVES.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
Textedly is an amazing service. I am able to deploy marketing campaigns to people who are opted into our phone marketing campaigns. I love Textedly because we can manage out Phone List and people are easily able to opt out when needed.

I also love that anyone can sign up for our mailing list by texting a keyword to one of Textedly's short code phone number. Also I love that it's a month to month plan allowing up to upgrade/downgrade within our means of advertising.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
I dislike that we're not able to get a dedicated phone number without paying alot of money. You're messages may be sent with the same number as other major companies. Not a huge deal, but it can get confusing.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
When searching for a company that offers SMS Marketing, we had to choose between alot of companies. Compared to the others, Textedly was a really simple to use. They had a free trial that we utilized and it was really easy to set up. I recommend them now because their support team has gone above and beyond when it comes to helping set up new campaigns.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Textedly we're able to get more intimate with our clients, by sending them progress updates via SMS and promotional offers that are being offered right now. We saw an increase in customer retention when we implemented Textedly, as it seem to increase our company-client relationship. It also increased our brand recognition as this is a huge feature our clients talk about when referring new clients!

all_reviews.review_title: Straight Forward SMS marketing at reasonable rates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
I like the ease of use for the platform.  It is easy to set and use on a daily basis.
The dashboard and menus on the software are very intuititve and lead you to where you are looking to go within the software.  Its clean and simple.  You get a keyword that users text to a number and that subscribes them to the list.  From there you can blast out marketing messages to your clients and customers via SMS.  This allows for almost instant receipt of the message and near 100% open rates according to some surveys and studies.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
Textedly doesn't have the most features out of SMS marketing companies.  It would be nice to have a phone number on our website that customers could text and open up a SMS conversation with them from a web interface.  But I think for what you pay for the trade off is still worth it.

Recommendations to others considering Textedly:
I would say go ahead and give it a try.  You get a thirty day trial at no cost.  So there isn't really any risk trying the software.  And they have different levels of subscription to match your list size which is nice.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problem we are trying to solve is getting our customers to open the communications we send to them.  Email open rates are very low while SMS open rates are absurdly high.  So being able to reach them and have them open our communications really is what we are after.

Textedly has had amazing customer service from the start. Their prices were much lower than competitors, which had me skeptical at first, but James who I am working with was very transparent and we have had no surprise costs in the 5 months we have been using it! Our campaigns for events all over the US have run smoothly with no issues, and they check in on a regular basis to make sure everything is still going good.

What do you dislike about Textedly?

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lead generation and product/event signups are our main focus. Using an SMS campaign for offers is much better than handing out cards that people throw away. They can quickly text in and then they have all the information in front of them on their phones. Attendees get a lot of collateral at events so finding a better solution was crucial, and Textedly has been that solution for us.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Service for very reasonable cost!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Textedly?
I did a lot of looking around for a bulk texting platform and no one comes close to matching Textedly's costs. I was actually skeptical of their service because of the cost, but we have been very impressed so far.

Their customer service has been excellent and very responsive. We've sent out more than 25,000 texts in May without any real issues.

What do you dislike about Textedly?
The only negative is in how long the messages take to send sometimes. To send out to 4,000 subscribers has taken an hour on two occasions,. Most of the time the messages are sent almost immediately, though. We've had 2 slow times out of 25 sends.

What problems is Textedly solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Textedly to send bulk texts.
